unnormalised: Hey guys, interesting discussion on training! My friend, Dr. Sharma, swears by a 5 km run every morning. Says it's the key to his energy. I remember reading about Milkha Singh's brutal training too! It's gotta be personalized, right? What works for Rohan might not work for Lakshmi. Maybe a yoga session instead, in your 200 sq ft balcony? Rs. 500 says it'll help. Thoughts?
